title: [Boreas Ridge, Gregale Way]
description: The path sharply turns here before ascending, again set with an ornate invar guardrail.  The trees part near the ridge's edge to reveal a view all the way to the ocean with breath-taking effect, to the benefit of the estates here and those passing by.

The path sharply turns here before ascending, again set with an ornate invar guardrail.  The trees part near the ridge's edge to reveal a moonlit view all the way to the ocean with breath-taking effect, to the benefit of the estates here and those passing by.
